  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_108959</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_108959</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Magnetic field pattern around current-carrying wire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Magnetisch fangen Sie Muster um 
aktuell-tragende Leitung auf</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Configuration de champ magnétique autour de fil 
actuel-portant</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Teste padrão do campo magnético em torno do fio 
atual-carregando</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Modello del campo magnetico intorno a legare 
corrente-trasportante</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρότυπο μαγνητικών πεδίων γύρω από την 
παρών-μεταφορά του καλωδίου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Modelo del campo magnético alrededor del alambre
actual-que lleva</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These diagrams show the magnetic field patterns around a current-carrying wire (top) and the same wire with twice the current running in the opposite direction (bottom).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">current-carrying wire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electric current</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Fleming</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">left-hand rule</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic field patterns</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Diagramme stellen dar, daß die magnetischen
Muster um eine aktuell-tragende Leitung (Oberseite) und die gleiche 
Leitung mit zweimal dem aktuellen Betrieb in der entgegengesetzten 
Richtung (Unterseite) auffangen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces diagrammes montrent les configurations de 
champ magnétique autour d'un fil actuel-portant (dessus) et du même 
fil avec deux fois le fonctionnement actuel dans la direction opposée
(bas).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estes diagramas mostram os testes padrões do 
campo magnético em torno de um fio atual-carregando (alto) e do mesmo
fio com duas vezes o corredor atual no sentido oposto (fundo).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questi schemi mostrano due volte i modelli del 
campo magnetico intorno ad un legare corrente-trasportante (parte 
superiore) ed allo stesso legare con il funzionamento corrente nel 
senso opposto (parte inferiore).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτά τα διαγράμματα εμφανίζουν πρότυπα μαγνητικών 
πεδίων γύρω από ένα παρών-φέρνοντας καλώδιο (κορυφή) και το 
ίδιο καλώδιο με δύο φορές το παρόν τρέξιμο στην αντίθετη 
κατεύθυνση (κατώτατο σημείο).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estos diagramas muestran los modelos del campo 
magnético alrededor de un alambre actual-que lleva (tapa) y del mismo
alambre con dos veces el funcionamiento actual en la dirección 
opuesta (fondo).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">aktuell-tragende Leitung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektrischer Strom</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fleming</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">linke Richtlinie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">magnetisch fangen Sie Muster auf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">fil actuel-portant</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">courant électrique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fleming</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">règle à gauche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">configurations de champ magnétique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fio atual-carregando</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">corrente elétrica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fleming</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">régua da mão esquerda</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">testes padrões do campo magnético</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">legare corrente-trasportante</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">corrente elettrica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fleming</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">regola a mano sinistra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">modelli del campo magnetico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παρών-φέρνοντας καλώδιο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ηλεκτρικό ρεύμα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Fleming</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αριστερός κανόνας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πρότυπα μαγνητικών πεδίων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">alambre actual-que lleva</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">corriente eléctrica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fleming</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">regla izquierda</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">modelos del campo magnético</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
